item.title: Delightful Feline Antics Abound: Enjoy an Excerpt of SAPHIE THE ONE-EYED CAT by JOHO
item.description: Fans of Pusheen and Chi, get to know Saphie the one-eyed cat and her feline siblings! Check out an excerpt of this all-ages graphic novel.

item.title: An Eye-Opening Look at the Fight for Tribal Land
item.description: This recounting of a murder trial at the heart of a battle for tribal land and sovereignty offers a nuanced and earnest history lesson.

item.title: Read These Queer Romantic Suspense Novels
item.description: These five queer romantic suspense novels stand out for their twisty plots and chemistry, with a mix of speculative and real-world settings.

item.title: 11 Book Club Picks for February 2025
item.description: Want to get involved in a book club? Here are 11 clubs, what they're reading in February, and how you can take part in the conversation.
